object.name: InputStoryContentPhoto
object.description: Describes a photo to post as a story.
object.html_description: Describes a photo to post as a story.
object.rst_description: Describes a photo to post as a story.

annotations.description: Type of the content, must be 'photo'
annotations.rst_description: Type of the content, must be 'photo'
annotations.name: type

annotations.description: The photo to post as a story. The photo must be of the size 1080x1920 and must not exceed 10 MB. The photo can't be reused and can only be uploaded as a new file, so you can pass 'attach://<file_attach_name>' if the photo was uploaded using multipart/form-data under <file_attach_name>. More information on Sending Files
annotations.html_description: The photo to post as a story. The photo must be of the size 1080x1920 and must not exceed 10 MB. The photo can't be reused and can only be uploaded as a new file, so you can pass “attach://<file_attach_name>” if the photo was uploaded using multipart/form-data under <file_attach_name>. More information on Sending Files »

annotations.name: photo
